documents.document: Hearing Mark "freestyle" some old school Linkin Park in the @AuntyDonnaBoys podcast made my life.
I feel bad that every time someone in Perth has a birthday, someone like me says '"Happy Perth-Day."
It can't be a coincidence that 'fuzzy little man peach' perfectly describes Trump - @noelfielding11 @julian_barratt
@ozflixtv launches on Australia day w/ Me & My Mates vs The Zombie Apocalypse - check it out! @filmink @ScreenAustralia
Congrats to @nealbrennan on 3 Mics. Incredible special, great concept, dxpertly realized. Touching and funny. Check it out on netflix.
@sethsentry If you do, I will listen to it.
Hey @Daley_Pearson check out this pilot to an audio sitcom I made, you might dig it: https://t.co/JMrfIsmRv2
@NtheodoraK wrote an article about R.Gosling being sexist & linked the "woman make 77c on the $ to men" claim to an article that debunks it.
Free bars @3ree6ixty @sethsentry @PurposePE @blissneso https://t.co/t3X3F3Ds1i
I've just heard that public and private schools in Australia are teaching the Arabic number system! How do we stop this? #outraged @chaser
Hold up. Steven Tyler + Joe Perry = Tyler Perry?! I'll never look at "Madea's Aerosmith Live In Concert" the same way.
@VapidVixen in my opinion it's a must watch, Greg Fleet is great in it and Alex Williamson and Jim Jefferies are really funny
@chrissparling during the election period the nominees should have to undertake public psych eval and an economic and social knowledge quiz
My band Pleased to Jive You just released their new project: the HAND POWER EP (free download) - https://t.co/EpxshdpI62
The world of professional coin flipping is explored in the latest Quippurb Podcast: https://t.co/N1MwxL9pR2 #comedy #podcast #improv
@creepypuppet @LWhannell There's so much potential for a Saw escape-room style game in VR!
"You can't threaten an atheist with hell. It'd be like a hippie threatening to punch you in your aura" - @JoshThomas87 in Please Like Me.
Part 2 of Gruff N Gordo is out now! If @JamieKennedy listens to this, we'll probably do an entire episode about him https://t.co/5CgenXq92Z
@thegregfleet This guy is a youtuber who does public stunts/"social experiments" so wouldn't be surprised if this isn't the whole story...
The US: They're just jealous that we actually HAVE elections.
Wait, both @creepypuppet & @LWhannell are shooting films in Aus?! Who do I have to put a reverse bear-trap on to somehow be involved?
New episode of my comedy podcast. This ones about two jobless commercial radio DJ's trying their luck at podcasting: https://t.co/IwrLsJ0OkD
@sethsentry Could be January, supposedly they're done with the episodes
Shows like "The Last Man On Earth" and "The Good Place" give me hope for more high-concept half-hour comedies!
If you're reading this tweet, you could listen to this radio play I made, its 10 minutes long and attemptedly funny: https://t.co/e8FWjWEaCD
I'm actually the person who coined the term "post-truth."
Now you're going to stand there and tell me that "wi-fi" doesn't stand for "wireless-fireless"?!
The new episode of the Quippurb Radio Podcast Show is up! It's called "Pros and Cons" and is 10 mins long. Listen: https://t.co/e8FWjWEaCD
In Harry Potter, what does the Sorting Hat do for the other 364 days a year? Is the poor guy just chucked in a closet somewhere?
My brother just screamed at me to come see that @adelevuko85 was on TV! #20to1 Can't wait for #whambam
Strongly considering creating some real relationship problems just so I can get on @unqualified with @SimSarna & @AnnaKFaris
The Amanda Knox doco on Netflix taught me an important lesson. Never give yourself a nickname on your social media. #foxyknoxy
Check out my new #comedy #podcast where we make ~10 min audio sitcoms, plays and sketches. https://t.co/mcemL1ADvu https://t.co/rP29dV1cje
#Westworld theory: Season 2 is Anthony Hopkins and co. realising that they're just characters in a TV show and coming after Jonathan Nolan.
@LandriganMatt @thegregfleet @StanAustralia @NetflixANZ yeah but they'd all be through different distribution deals/companies to us
@thegregfleet @LandriganMatt Would love to get the flick on @StanAustralia or @NetflixANZ - not sure how though.
Just launched the first episodes of my 10 minute comedy podcast: audio sitcoms, sketches, improv. Listen here: https://t.co/Mj42F5OaRy
@AuntyDonnaBoys Great episode, my favourite so far!
Damn, who told Trump that Hamilton was overrated? Was it Pence? "How was the show, though?" https://t.co/Xd7Ta42sp0
@David_M_Green next time you're working on Mad As Hell can you please refer to Turnbull as "Trunchbull" like the headmistress from Matilda?
Just spotted @DavidHMandel cameo in Jay & Silent Bob Strike Back drinking in front of a bus. I wonder if we'll ever see more Clerks cartoon?
Pitched a new idea for a feature film this weekend to ScreenACT. "Turritopsis," a sci-fi crime thriller. https://t.co/7hw2dMHXKW
I have an irrational dislike of people ranking things they like. Can't we just appreciate good things without comparing them?

Turnbull Government looking likely to be the last one before gay marriage is legalized. Liberals on the wrong side of history again.
@Daley_Pearson Hey Daley, are you reprising your role as Daryl in the new Thor?
"Why is it that a woman always thinks that the most savage thing she can say to a man is to impugn his cocksmanship?"- Network (1976)
@JosephKahn just send him an out of the blue email saying "I liked Lord of the Rings. Good job with that."
@HarrisonTheFan finally! You guys were in that movie with the zombies together!
You think you're tough? Today I parked in a 15 minute zone for 7 hours. And didn't get a fine. I am invincible.
Everyone's talks about releasing presidential candidate tax or medical info. Google search history is the only true barometer. Release that!
@suspend0 ST had 6/8 eps directed by creator/showrunner and other 2 directed by producer who shepherded the project. No outside directors.
@MrCombustible @GAMMACON and then come by to see the second half of our monstrous panel!
@MrCombustible @GAMMACON Nooo! Might have to skip my panel for yours! You can hang out at the movie screening before and promote your panel!
They say George Lucas still, to this day, goes back and makes microedits on the IMDb page for Star Wars.
My friends got money from Screen Australia and Google to make a web series! Watch them live the dream! https://t.co/11GO4P6ZQA
Super pumped for @GAMMACON this year! We'll be screening Me and My Mates vs the Zombie Apocalypse and doing a panel. Last year rocked!
Really enjoyed The Invitation (2015). Slow burn, great ending.
@BobSnz Massive congrats! You sent this script to me when I was a kid on imdb years ago and to this day it's one of the best specs I've read

@klugula thanks for the review, loved it!
Enjoying @davidcrosss new Netflix special. Hilarious and hardcore.
Watching Soul Mates season 2 on @abciview - So jealous of these dudes. Such a good show. @nickboshier @FullySickRapper

I'd love to see Aaron Sorkin's MISSION TO MARS.
"You need to check your privilege." "You need to check-your-Slovakia!"
@bookbeaut but have blocked him so he can't respond/reach out. And they tell their fanbase that he's a creep for wanting to try talk (2/2)

@hewsandison nah, he's a dick.
@hewsandison mayor of Sydney is also a close personal friend, so I'll just sleep on his floor.
@hewsandison cool, I'll let the mayor of Canberra (close personal friend) know that you're no longer welcome.
@hewsandison did you have your date with the official branding iron?
I'm the type of guy to send out formal invites to all of my friends to come to my "weeding" just because I don't want garden alone.
Hello Mr. Bad Guy from the 90's, welcome to the ponytail store.
Someone needs to fan-fic a new movie starring Ben Affleck & Matt Damon called "Batman v Bourne."
@Uptomyknees @BanannaBich2014 "Your Honour, yes I know I was stealing. But other people have stolen before..."
1, 2, 3 & to the 4. Snoop Doggy Dogg and Dr. Dree is at the door. I'm sorry, but for it to rhyme, you'll have to call yourself Dr. Dree.
The only reason to watch movies in 3D is to get a realistic view of just how round your favourite actors heads are.
@sethsentry Great show! Liked seeing you play with the tracks and keep the audience guessing! Good luck on the new songs!
@PeteFTD Nah, I wish. I've been watching it all on Netflix, recognising a ton of Aus actors. There is the US one too which is also good.
"I'm sorry, that ship has sailed." "But ships turn around all the time! What if the captain left his wallet at home?!"
Just saw @nathan_lovejoy pop up in Review With Myles Barlow! Classic.
Congrats to the Spierig brothers on landing #Saw8 - as someone who also made a low budget funny Aussie zombie movie, there's hope for me yet
